column1: Appendix table 13: Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction, by sex, race, Hispanic origin, and age, December 31, 2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Appendix table 13. Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction, by sex, race, Hispanic origin, and age, December 31, 2009
Note: Totals based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. See Methodology for estimation method.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, other Pacific Islanders, and persons identifying two or more races.
b/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin.
